sources.title: Ice Cream Man (1995) Clint Howard, Justin Isfeld | Comedy, Horror | Full Movie | Subtitled
sources.description:
0I scream, you scream, we all scream for the...
Poor Gregory. After being released from the Wishing Well Sanatorium, all he wants to do is make the children happy. So Gregory reopens the old ice cream factory, and all the unappreciative brats are reprocessed into the flavor of the day.

Director: Norman Apstein
Writers: David Dobkin, Sven Davison
Stars: Clint Howard, Justin Isfeld, Anndi McAfee
Genres: Comedy, Horror, Thriller

00:00 Full movie
00:55  A group of kids interact with an ice cream man and discuss a story about the Pied Piper.
09:56  A family dinner takes a chaotic turn as they discuss a missing child and make plans for the future.
16:16  A group of children interact with an ice cream man and discuss various topics.
25:12  A child witnesses a murder committed by the ice cream man and seeks help from their parents.
33:57  A group of kids decide to catch a murderer on film after their friend goes missing in their neighborhood.
44:16  A group of kids encounter a suspicious ice cream man who may be a child stalker.
56:07  A group of people discover a secret ingredient in ice cream and uncover a dark secret at a mental hospital.
1:09:51  A group of kids try to escape from an ice cream man who is actually a dangerous criminal.
1:18:14  A group of children try to hide from the ice cream man who is after them.

@CultCinemaClassics
